show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: The “T” Word: A Political Quandary (Part 2)
content:
We continue the conversation on terrorism, looking in particular at our twisted relationship with it. <!--more--> We are inclined to condemn it as an undemocratic means of social and political control, but even in routine ways we endorse, accept and insist upon its application to achieve what we define and defend as democracy and the greater good.
It’s all about contradictions, and no one is spared today on Leid Stories.
